mapper.select: /* com.neofect.gts.services.worker.worker.repository.WorkerInfoRepository.getWorkerInfoList 직원정보 목록 */ SELECT A.MEMBER_ID, A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NAME, A.MEMBER_DIV, A.EMP_NO, A.NAME, A.REG_CODE, '19'||SUBSTR(A.REG_CODE,1,6) AS BIRTH_DT, A.GUBUN_DIV, A.IN_DATE, A.RETIRE_DATE, TRUNC((SYSDATE - A.IN_DATE) / 365,0) AS WORK_YEAR, A.HOURPAY, A.HOURPAY_2, A.HOURPAY_3, A.HOURPAY_4, A.HANDICAP_YN, A.HANDICAP_LEVEL, A.WORK_YN, A.PAYTYPE, A.PAYUPDATE_YN, A.LICENSE_NO, A.LICENSELEVEL_DIV, A.PHONE, A.HP, A.ZIP_CODE, A.EMAIL, A.ADDR1, A.ADDR2, A.BANK_DIV, A.DEPOSITNO, A.REG_DATE, A.PWD, A.PWD AS INPUT_PWD, A.AMMASTER_YN, A.AUTHORITY_DIV, A.EMAIL2, A.YEAR_VACATION , (SELECT SUM(VACATION_TOTAL_DAYS) FROM MEMBER_VACATION WHERE A.MEMBER_ID=MEMBER_ID AND OK_YN='Y' AND YEAR=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')) AS USED_VACATION, A.RETIRECALCTYPE, A.REPORTEDINCOMEAMT, A.DEDUCT_CNT, A.MANYCHILD_YN, A.LIINSURANCEDATE, A.LIINSURANCETYPE, A.LIINSURANCEENDDATE, A.DEPOSITOWNER, A.SMS_QUOTA1, A.SMS_QUOTA2, F_GS_GET_DUP_DEPT_NM(A.MEMBER_ID,A.DEPT_ID) AS DUP_DEPT_NAME, A.HEALTHINSURETAG, A.NATIONALPENSIONTAG, A.PIMG, L.FILE_STRE_COURS || '\' || L.STRE_FILE_NM AS PIMG_PATH, --사원이미지1경로 A.PDIR, A.FAMILY_YN, A.GOYONGTAG, A.MIN_PAYAMT, A.TRAINEE_YN, A.TRAINEE_DATE, A.FIRST_AMT, A.RRN_NO, X_DECRYPT(A.RRN_NO) AS INPUT_RRN_NO, A.REMARK, A.PAGE_TAG, A.LOGIN_LOCK_YESNO FROM CODE_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN CODE_DEPT B ON B.DEPT_ID = A.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SM_COMM_FILE_DETAIL L ON L.ATCH_FILE_ID = A.PIMG AND L.FILE_SN = 1 WHERE ( (#{deptId} = '%' AND NVL(A.DEPT_ID, '%') LIKE #{deptId} AND B.USE_YN='Y') OR (#{deptId} != '%' AND NVL(A.DEPT_ID, '%') LIKE #{deptId}) ) AND NVL(A.GUBUN_DIV,'%') LIKE #{gubunDiv} AND NVL(A.WORK_YN,'%') LIKE #{workYn} AND ( ( A.MEMBER_ID LIKE #{searchKeyword}||'%' ) OR ( A.EMP_NO LIKE #{searchKeyword}||'%' ) OR ( A.NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' ) ) ORDER BY A.DEPT_ID, A.NAME, A.MEMBER_ID ASC

/* com.neofect.gts.services.worker.worker.repository.WorkerInfoRepository.selectWorkerRegistNumber 주민 번호 조회 */ SELECT A.MEMBER_ID, A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NAME, A.NAME, A.REG_CODE, A.GUBUN_DIV, A.LICENSE_NO, A.LICENSELEVEL_DIV, A.PHONE, A.HP, A.ZIP_CODE, A.EMAIL, A.ADDR1, A.ADDR2, A.BANK_DIV, A.DEPOSITNO, A.IN_DATE, A.RETIRE_DATE, A.WORK_YN FROM CODE_MEMBER A INNER JOIN CODE_DEPT B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE REG_CODE = #{regCode} ORDER BY IN_DATE DESC, RETIRE_DATE

/* com.neofect.gts.services.worker.worker.repository.WorkerInfoRepository.selectWorkerMemberId 사번으로 입사 퇴사일 정보 및 상태 조회 */ SELECT A.MEMBER_ID, A.SEQ, A.STARTDATE, A.ENDDATE, A.TYPE FROM CODE_LIINSURANCE A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{id} ORDER BY STARTDATE DESC
/* com.neofect.gts.services.worker.worker.repository.WorkerInfoRepository.selectWorkerMemberIdDuplicateCheck */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CODE_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{memberid}
